intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to create a Premises Document for documenting information about the Livestock at your Premises.

item.title: Show Tracker Perspective
item.description: Open the Tracker perspective in the Workbench.

item.title: Create or Open a Project
item.description: Create a new Project or Open an old Project in the Workbench.

item.title: Create New Premises Document
item.description:
File > New > Premises Document.
Then Select the parent project folder of the Premises Document.

item.title: Show Properties View
item.description: To edit the entries in a Premises Document open the Properties view.

item.title: Document Premises Details
item.description:
Tracker Editors show documents as trees of parent and child entries.
Selecting entries in the Editor trees will display their details in the Properties view.
In the instance of the Premises Editor where the new Premises Document is displayed, select the root Premises entry.
In the Properties view you can now enter or change the properties of the Premises entry.

item.title: Show Animals View
item.description: Open the Animals view to add Animals to the Premises Document.

item.title: Add Animals
item.description:
The Animals view is a composite master-detail view of the Animals in a Premises.
Like the Properties view you can use this view to see and edit details about Animals. You can also use this view to sort, filter, and navigate through all Animals in the Premises Document. Select the green + in the toolbar of the Animals view to add Animals to the Premises.

item.title: Show Events View
item.description: Once you have added one or more Animals you can associate event information with them. Open the Events view to add Events to Animals in the Premises Document.

item.title: Add Events
item.description:
Like the Animals view the Events view is a composite master-detail view of the Events associated with the Animals in a Premises.
Use this view to add details, filter, and navigate through all Events in the Premises Document. Select the green + in the toolbar of the Events view to add Events to the Animals.

item.title: Save Document
item.description:
Once your done with adding Premises details, Animals and Events to the Premises Document save the file.
File > Save
To save the Premises Document to Disk.
